title: Searge: 将发布1.8-pre2
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-8-25 18:32 编辑 

Searge: There will be a new pre-release (1.8-pre2) soon, unfortunately some of the issues reported on the bugtracker make it necessary.
Searge: The witherskulls/fireballs bug is one of the reasons for pre2. We'll fix issues that are crashes or can break world saves. Nothing else!

Searge: 等会会有一个新的预发布版（1.8-pre2），不幸的是一些在漏洞追踪器上汇报的漏洞让它变得十分必要。
Searge: 凋灵之首[sup]1[/sup]/火球漏洞是pre2将被发布的原因之一。我们也会修复崩溃与损坏存档的漏洞。没啥其他的了！


[1]：应该指的是凋灵发射用来攻击的头
